general_advisory: In view of heavy rainfall forecast, stop sowing of seeds and top dressing of fertilizers. Make provisions for drainage, where kharif maize or pulses etc. have been sown. Cover the vegetable nursery with polythene to protect it from heavy rain. Prevailing cloudy weather and high relative humidity condition is favorable for pest attack in standing crops. So regular monitoring and appropriate plant protection measures should be taken.

advisory: Transplanting of 20-25 days old seedlings should have a spacing of 20x15 cm, plant 2- 3 seedlings per hill for high yielding varieties.
To control weed infestation in Paddy field use herbicide Pretilachlor 37% EW @ 600 ml/acre or Oxadiargyl 80% W.P @ 50g/acre at 1-3 DAT.
Spray the herbicide by mixing it in 200 litres of water per acre or mix the herbicide with 20 kg of sand and broadcast it uniformly.
In medium and long duration sugarcane varieties, wrapping and propping should be done in 4- 5 months old crop to keep the cane erect.
To manage mealy Bug in sugarcane crop spray Imidacloprid 17.8 % SL @ 60ml/acre or Thiamethoxam 25 % WG @ 40g/acre or Profenophos 50 % EC @ 400 ml/acre by mixing.
To control damping off disease of Brinjal seedlings in the nursery, there should be a proper drainage system.
Seed treatment should be done with Trichodermaasperellum @ 4 gm per kg of seeds or Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 gm / kg of seed 24 hours before sowing of seeds.
Drench the bed soil with a solution of 20 gm Metalaxyl and Mancozeb in 10-litre water.
There are chances of sucking pest like aphids, Jassids, thrips, and whiteflies in Okra due to prevailing weather condition.

After cessation of rain to control these sucking pests spray Thiamethoxam 25% WG @ 40 g/acre or Acetamiprid 20 % SP@ 50 g /acre or Tolfenpyrad 15 % EC @ 400 ml/acre by mixing it in 200 litres of water.
Provide staking and make provision for drainage.
To manage panama wilt, select disease-free planting material and resistant cultivar like Bantal, Robusta, Champa, Kabuli etc.

Banana suckers should be dipped with a solution of Carbendazim @ 10-gram/10- litre of water before planting followed by bimonthly drenching of soil around the pseudostem starting from 5 months after planting.
During the rainy season keep the animals indoors.
Good quality and quantity green, dry fodder and concentrate feed are fed to the animal during the rainy period.
Feeds and fed ingredients are to be stored in a dry place with a proper platform and free from rain and moisture.
Deworming is to be done after onset, in the middle and at the end of the rainy season.
Vaccinate the goat against Peste des petits Ruminants (PPR) disease and after 1 month, vaccinate against Enterotoxaemia (ET) disease.
Goats are suffered hoof problem during the rainy season. Cleaning the hooves with lime twice a week can reduce the problem of hoof ulcers.
Heavy rainfall may decrease the salinity of water in the pond. Farmers are advised to apply alky-dimethyl-benzyl ammonium chloride (3 ppm) as a disinfectant after cessation of rain.
Bamboo or nylon mesh screens should be erected at the inlets and outlets to prevent loss and entry of unwanted fish.
Nylon nets may be erected on bunds to prevent the loss of fish with overflowing water.
